title: I LOSE TOO MUCH LP PER A MATCH
body: i've been playing lol for half year and this time is my first time ranking... the moment i got to B4 every time i win a match i get 12-14 but when i lose i lose 22-27.... i'm kinda new to lol so i don't understand everything so rito please help XoX

replies.body: Don't let the harsh LP losses discourage you. As you win more games, the LP gains should begin to normalise.
I had the same problem, I dropped from gold 2 promos to gold 4(0LP) absolutely ridiculous, some error is happening to some people mmrs for sure. {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
